Class MarkovProcessor

java.lang.Object
de.unistuttgart.ils.aircraftsystemsarchitect.game.handler.simulation.markov.MarkovProcessor
public class MarkovProcessor extends Object
a generic markov chain processor class that can be called from anywhere

    • getProbabilityForStatesWith

      public static double[] getProbabilityForStatesWith(MarkovState state, int correctActuatorCount, int correctSensorCount, int correctCPUCount, int OOCActuatorCount, int OOCSensorCount, int OOCCPUCount)
      calculate the probability for all combined states that have enough actuators working TODO: implement maximum ooc variables
      Parameters:
      state - : the starting state
      correctActuatorCount - : the amount of correct actuators (min)
      correctSensorCount - : the amount of correct sensors (min)
      correctCPUCount - : the amount of correct CPUs (min)
      Returns:
      the probability for the condition given (combined of all states found)

      Parameters:
